channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Winter storm that dropped record-breaking snow in New Orleans spreads into Florida and the Carolinas
item.description: A major winter storm that slammed Texas and the northern Gulf Coast is spreading heavy snow, sleet and freezing rain across parts of the Florida panhandle and eastern Carolinas.

item.title: Fire risk and strong winds continue in Southern California with potential rain on the horizon
US adults want border security action but mostly oppose arrests in schools, churches: AP-NORC poll
